about_the_game:
Don't let your horror gaming events, deaths, or unsavoury endings go without the perfect musical touch to drive it home! This pack of 100 Music Events will give you tons of variety for punctuating those unfortunate moments. Contains themes for Endings, Sorrow, Mystery, Shock, Item-get, Save, Loading, and lots more!

Features:

* 100 ME for your dark horror games!
* Royalty-free music
* For use with Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

Horror ME x 10
Mystery ME x 10
Sorrow ME x 10
Shock ME x 5
Happening ME x 5
Itemget-Happy ME x 5
Itemget-Sad ME x 5
Find ME x 5
Happy ME x 5
Comical ME x 5
Rest ME x 5
Save ME x 5
Loading ME x 5
Story ME x 20
